attributes.action: Create a Political system free from party politics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
These are some of my ideas for reforming the Political system.
● Split the current job of MP up into a constituency Governor and an MP, MPs to be elected proportionally and Governors to be elected on Constituency basis to govern the constituency.
●Allow anyone to run as an Independent MP or Governor. 
●Create a political lending system, in which people are lent money to fund campaigns by political brokers
● Organisations would be unable to run for government however it can still exist to co-ordinate supporters, who have to run by themselves and not be elected as a collective group. 
● Make Cabinet elected
 ● Have a lottery (between all judges)for a small number of Judges to monitor corruption and political brokers who serving short times in office (for example 6 months before being rotated) 
● Have a lottery for Magistrates (between all magistrates) to monitor individual regions and ensure that a manifesto is produced pre election  and is analysed after their term.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
